title: Productive Failure-Based Collaborative Problem-Solving Learning Design

context.additional_context: Structuring asynchronous collaborative learning environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze failure cases from complex language problem-solving processes and identify at least three core error patterns
Learners can recognize and calibrate conceptual knowledge gaps through peer collaboration with over 80% accuracy
Learners can systematically organize insights derived from productive failure phases and apply them at least three times in final project reports

resources: Digital Collaboration Platform (Google Workspace, Notion, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
